resources.string: • You are recognized as a legal rural healthcare provider by the government of India. • Incentive of Rs. 150 on every TB patient data by the RHCP and free medicines for the first 10 TB patients. • Receive diagnostic kits for TB skin test at subsidized rate. • Receive anti-TB FDC’s for TB at a subsidized rate. • Receive support from the government during an epidemic emergency in your area.
Congratulations on becoming a certified Rural Health Care Provider (RHCP). Benefits of becoming a RHCP-
Become a certified legal rural healthcare provider (RHCP) by attending these free training programs to receive benefits from the government.
You become a certified RHCP only upon completion of all these training programs.
